text.section: An applicant for a license shall submit an application to the Secretary on the form that the Secretary requires.

An application for a license to operate a medical laboratory shall include:
The name of the owner;
The classes of services, complexity of testing, or the tests or examinations that the medical laboratory would provide; and
Any other information that the Secretary requires.
The applicant shall pay to the Department the application fee set by the Secretary in accordance with § 2-104 of this article.
